name: _TERMINAL
description:
Your mouse is not working anymore, you have to use your keyboard and the terminal to find the root folder. Awake the hacker in you !

You need both ggj_root.x86_64 and ggj_root.pck in the same directory to run the linux version.

The web version needs to be run on a server (godot bug), this can easily be done with the integrated python server (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Common_questions/set_up_a_local_t...).
